summary: A motley crew of criminals plans to rob a Los Angeles bank that's temporarily located in a mobile home during renovations.
cast: George C. Scott|Joanna Cassidy|Sorrell Booke|G. Wood|Clifton James|Bob Balaban|Bibi Osterwald|Frank McRae|Don Calfa|Harvey Evans|Hank Stohl|Liam Dunn|Jack Riley|Pat Zurica|Harvey J. Goldenberg|Jamie Reidy|Bob Herron|Bob Hoy|Jack Perkins
title: El loco, loco asalto a un banco
